          <title>
            <string language="en">Fuels that contain carbon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftstoffe, die Carbon enthalten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carburants qui contiennent le carbone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combustíveis que contêm o carbono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combustibili che contengono il carbonio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καύσιμα που περιέχουν τον άνθρακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Combustibles que contienen el carbón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows examples of fuels that contain carbon. Fuels containing carbon burn to produce carbon dioxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Charcoal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">petrol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wood</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Beispiele der Kraftstoffe, 
die Carbon enthalten. Die Kraftstoffe, die Carbon enthalten, 
brennen, um Kohlendioxyd zu produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des exemples des 
carburants qui contiennent le carbone. Les carburants contenant 
le carbone brûlent pour produire l'anhydride carbonique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra exemplos dos combustíveis
que contêm o carbono. Os combustíveis que contêm o carbono 
queimam-se para produzir o dióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli esempi dei 
combustibili che contengono il carbonio. I combustibili che 
contengono il carbonio si bruciano per produrre l'anidride carbonica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει παραδείγματα των καυσίμων
που περιέχουν τον άνθρακα. Τροφοδοτεί τον περιορισμό του 
εγκαύματος άνθρακα για να παραγάγει το διοξείδιο του άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra ejemplos de los 
combustibles que contienen el carbón. Los combustibles que 
contienen el carbón se queman para producir el bióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
